params.recipient: The address of the user claiming ETH rewards
params.strategies: An array of strategyIDs to claim rewards for

params.ethAmount: The amount of ETH sent with the deposit
params.tokens: Array of token the token addresses
The tokens and amounts to enter into the strategy
The tokens and amounts to withdraw

params._strategies: the strategies to get balances for
params._tokens: the tokens to get balances for

returns.strategyBalance: The user's invested funds in the strategies

returns.amount: the amount of tokens the user has invested across all strategies

params.user: the user who holds the funds

returns.amount: the amount of token that the user has invested in the strategy

params.controllers_: The addresses of the controlling contracts

params.users: the user data to add to the strategy

params.asset: Address of the ERC20 token contract

returns._0: The total balance of the asset deposited in the system

params.asset: Address of the ERC20 token contract
Address of the ERC20 token contract
Address of the ERC20 token contract

params.recipient: The address of the user withdrawing
params.tokens: Array of token the token addresses
params.withdrawWethAsEth: Boolean indicating whether should receive WETH balance as ETH

params.recipient: The address of the user withdrawing tokens
params.strategies: Array of strategy IDs that user is claiming rewards from
params.tokens: Array of token address that user is exiting positions from
params.withdrawWethAsEth: Boolean indicating whether should receive WETH balance as ETH

returns.biosClaimed: The amount of BIOS being claimed from rewards
returns.ethClaimed: The amount of ETH being claimed from rewards
returns.ethWithdrawn: The amount of ETH being withdrawn
returns.tokenAmounts: The amounts of each token being withdrawn

_biosRewardsDuration.details: This is deprecated - now live in BiosRewards.sol

deposit(address,address[],uint256[],uint.notice: User is allowed to deposit whitelisted tokens

enterStrategy(uint256,(address,uint256)[.notice: Adds a user's funds to a strategy to be deployed

exitStrategy(uint256,(address,uint256)[].notice: Marks a user's funds as withdrawable

getUserBalances(address,uint256[],addres.notice: Returns a user's balances for requested strategies, and the users total invested amounts for each token requested

getUserInvestedAmountByToken(address,add.notice: Returns the amount of a given token that a user has invested across all strategies

getUserStrategyBalanceByToken(uint256,ad.notice: returns the amount of a given token a user has invested in a given strategy

migrateUser(uint256,(address,(address,ui.notice: Migrates user strategy positions to the new system

updateUserInterconnectBalances(address[].notice: Updates a user's interconnected balance. Only called by controlled contracts or relayer

updateUserTokenBalances(address[],addres.notice: Updates a user's local balance. Only called by controlled contracts or relayer

withdraw(address,address[],uint256[],boo.notice: User is allowed to withdraw tokens

withdrawAllAndClaim(address,address[],ui.notice: Allows a user to withdraw entire balances of the specified tokens and claim rewards

userdoc.notice: Allows users to deposit/withdraw erc20 tokens
